attributes.name: Color
attributes.author: Jim Lindblom <jim@sparkfun.com>
attributes.sentence: A simple library for the Particle Photon that generates Phant posts, gets, deletes and more. Ported to Particle by Ben Artin <ben@artins.org>

readme:
ColorArduino
============

Color library for Arduino with Hue Saturation and Brightness conversion to RGB.
